typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, movieid as string, title as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 derive(movies = @(movieis=movies.movieid,
		title=movies.title,
		genres=movies.genres,
		year=movies.year+100,
		rating=movies.rating)) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, movieid as string, title as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		movies = DerivedColumn1@movies,
		id,
		title = DerivedColumn1@movies
	)) ~> sink1
